name: Blue Core X
description:
Blue Core X is a top down.

The world is ruled by an empire corrupted for centuries. You are part of the resistance, you have to gain resources and land. conquering different enemy areas.

It has two game modes.

Defending:

The player has to protect a nucleus from enemy assaults, which have different routes. The player must position his defenses in order to gain advantages on the terrain and survive a number of waves per map.

Assault: The player has to explore a map to obtain a key and have a final showdown with different Bosses.
